typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		components_id as string,
		components_name as string,
		components_isDeprecated as string,
		components_type as string,
		dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[],
		product_id as string,
		product_name as string,
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	singleDocument: true) ~> atomsAugmented
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
